publications: [{"title":"Introducing yt 4.0: Analysis and Visualization of Volumetric Data","description":"yt is an open-source, community-developed platform for analysis of volumetric data, with readers for several dozen data formats, indexing systems for gridded data, adaptive mesh refinement data, unstructured mesh data, discrete and particle formats, and octree-based data, as well as the combination of these"}]
projects: [{"title":"Unscrapulous - Scrapes entities barred from doing financial business","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Feb 2021","description":"- Scrapes entities barred from doing financial business published by various legal institutions- Developed in 2 months as a part of my software engineering internship at Zerodha Broking Ltd"},{"title":"Medical OCR","start_date":"Mar 2018","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"- Converts handwritten medical prescriptions to digital format using Google Cloud Vision API, MicrosoftAzure Vision API, React.js, Flask, OpenCV, NLTK- Bagged 1st position in the opensoft intra-college hackathon with a team size of 20 competing with 20 other teams"},{"title":"Professors‚Äô timetable explorer","description":"- Built an app to find the timetable of 720+ professors using data scraped from the ERP of IIT Kharagpur‚àô Deployed as a Flask app and available on https://wimp.metakgp.org/ which now has 3000+ views"},{"title":"ROS Apps deployment","description":"Investigated on deploying Robotic Operating System applications using Docker containers"}]
